Class AclPermissionsFormViewProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.EntityViewProcessorAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.ExtensionViewProcessorAdapter<AclPermissionsFormController>
        • com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.acl.ui.AclPermissionsFormViewProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.EntityViewProcessor

    @ConditionalOnClass(value=com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.EntityViewProcessor.class)
 @Component
public class AclPermissionsFormViewProcessor
extends com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.ExtensionViewProcessorAdapter<AclPermissionsFormController>
    View processor for an ACL permissions form.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    AclPermissionsFormRegistry

      • adaptAclPermissionsForm

        protected AclPermissionsForm adaptAclPermissionsForm(AclPermissionsForm permissionsForm)
        Adapts the configured permissions form by creating a new instance with default methods where the configured version has missing values and defaults are possible.

        This also validates the correctness of the configured form.

        Parameters:
        permissionsForm - original configured form
        Returns:
        adapted version - should not have any missing properties

      • adaptAclPermissionsFormSection

        protected AclPermissionsFormSection adaptAclPermissionsFormSection(AclPermissionsFormSection section)
